title: Airship Event Extension
description: This mixin adds Airship specific event fields.

airship:offsetID.title: Event Offset Id
airship:offsetID.description: An identifier that represents the events location in the Airship event stream and can be used for troubleshooting or handling duplicate events.

airship:attributes.title: Airship Device Attributes
airship:attributes.description: Attributes specific to devices in Airship.

airship:localeVariant.title: Airship Locale Variant
airship:localeVariant.description: The language locale variant if one is reported for the device..

airship:uaSdkVersion.title: Airship SDK Version
airship:uaSdkVersion.description: The version of the Airship SDK used in the app.

airship:body.title: Airship Event Body
airship:body.description: Contains Airship specific event body fields.

airship:pushID.title: Push ID
airship:pushID.description: A unique identifier for a push operation.

airship:groupID.title: Airship Group ID
airship:groupID.description: Identifies a push delivered over an interval of time, e.g. multiple push_ids as part of the fulfillment of an automation or a push-to-local-time specification.

airship:variantID.title: Airship Variant ID
airship:variantID.description: The ID of the variant that a push is associated with, if the push was a part of an A/B test (experiment).

airship:alerting.title: Alerting Push
airship:alerting.description: If true, the send event was alerting. Alerting send event has notification text, badge, or sound.

airship:triggeringPush.title: Triggering Push
airship:triggeringPush.description: The specific push notification details associated with an event. An associated push helps you trace an event to the original notification or operation.An associated push object may specify a `time`, if the push was a singular operation sent at a defined time. Otherwise, the object will include a `group_id` if the push was sent at a relative time (`best_time` or `local_time`) an automation pipeline, or another operation resulting in multiple `push_id`s.

airship:campaign.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaign.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with. The campaigns object includes an array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:campaigns.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaigns.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with.

airship:categories.title: Airship Campaign Categories
airship:categories.description: An array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:pushID.title: Push ID
airship:pushID.description: A unique identifier for a push operation.

airship:groupID.title: Airship Group ID
airship:groupID.description: Identifies a push delivered over an interval of time, e.g. multiple push_ids as part of the fulfillment of an automation or a push-to-local-time specification.

airship:variantID.title: Airship Variant ID
airship:variantID.description: The ID of the variant that a push is associated with, if the push was a part of an A/B test (experiment).

airship:pushTime.title: Push Time
airship:pushTime.description: The UTC time when the push occurred.

airship:lastDelivered.title: Last Delivered
airship:lastDelivered.description: Identifies the last push notification the audience received before the event. Absent if the last push occurred more than 12 hours ago.

airship:campaign.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaign.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with. The campaigns object includes an array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:campaigns.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaigns.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with.

airship:categories.title: Airship Campaign Categories
airship:categories.description: An array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:pushID.title: Push ID
airship:pushID.description: A unique identifier for a push operation.

airship:groupID.title: Airship Group ID
airship:groupID.description: Identifies a push delivered over an interval of time, e.g. multiple push_ids as part of the fulfillment of an automation or a push-to-local-time specification.

airship:variantID.title: Airship Variant ID
airship:variantID.description: The ID of the variant that a push is associated with, if the push was a part of an A/B test (experiment).

airship:pushTime.title: Push Time
airship:pushTime.description: The UTC time when the push occurred.

airship:campaign.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaign.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with. The campaigns object includes an array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:campaigns.title: Airship Campaigns
airship:campaigns.description: An object listing the campaigns a push specification is associated with.

airship:categories.title: Airship Campaign Categories
airship:categories.description: An array of categories that must have between 1 and 10 elements, each of which is a string with a 64-byte limit.

airship:complianceEventType.title: Compliance Event Type
airship:complianceEventType.description: The type of compliance event for proving data-safety regulation compliance for email and SMS channel-related events.

airship:complianceProperties.title: Compliance Event Properties
airship:complianceProperties.description: Additional properties for a compliance event.

airship:messageType.title: Message Type
airship:messageType.description: The message type that the user unsubscribed from

airship:registrationType.title: Registration Type
airship:registrationType.description: The type of change to a registration status.

airship:commercialOptedIn.title: Commercial Opted In Date
airship:commercialOptedIn.description: The date and time when the user opted into commercial email messages.

airship:bounceClass.title: Bounce Class
airship:bounceClass.description: The bounce classification as provided by Airship email partners.

airship:bounceSender.title: Bounce Sender
airship:bounceSender.description: The address that the bounced email came from (typically the sender address for your project in Airship).

airship:bounceSubject.title: Bounce Subject
airship:bounceSubject.description: The subject line of the bounced email.

airship:regionAction.title: Region/Geofence Action
airship:regionAction.description: Indicates whether the event was the result of a user entering or exiting the region.

airship:regionName.title: Region/Geofence Name
airship:regionName.description: A friendly name for the region or geofence; may be provided from a third-party location partner.

airship:regionID.title: Region/Geofence Identifier
airship:regionID.description: The unique region identifier from the originating system or location partner.
